tooltips.ususminecraftmod.chisel_item: This chisel tipped with hematite can turn blocks into their brick form.
tooltips.ususminecraftmod.raw_hematite: When processed, raw hematite will turn into hematite which can be smelted into iron.
tooltips.ususminecraftmod.starlight_ashe: These ashes that come from stars are super hot and can be used as fuel in a furnace, blast furnace and smoker.
tooltips.ususminecraftmod.contaminated_s: These sweet berries were contaminated by hematite. The will fill your hunger but make you slightly sick.
tooltips.ususminecraftmod.hematite_proce: Use this block to process and convert a piece of raw hematite into hematite that you can smelt into iron.
tooltips.ususminecraftmod.hematite: This raw hematite was processed by crushing, grinding and more to create an ore that can be smelted down into iron.
